title: EventBridge Pipe from SQS to Step Functions with filter and transformation
description: Amazon EventBridge Pipe apply filter and transformation from Amazon Simple Queue Service to AWS Step Functions.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: The example will create an Amazon Simple Queue Service, AWS Step Functions and Amazon EventBridge Pipe.
Sending messages to the Amazon Simple Queue Service will trigger the pipe to initiate AWS Step Function execution.
SQS Messages will be filtered and transformed before sending to AWS Step Functions.
See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.
